cleaned_text: Chiropractic treatment can help you with a number of ailments. If you suffer from: - Back pain - Neck pain - Arm/leg pain - Headaches or migraines - Asthma - Arthritis - Numbness/tingling - Infections Or if you have been: - In a car accident - Hurt at work - Injured during a sport activity OCHC's Chiropractor Dr. Mark Garnett can help you! [Contact us to make your appointment now](http://opencitieshealth.org/schedule-appointment/), or read on to learn more about this type of treatment. What is Chiropractic? Chiropractic uses manual therapies to improve muscle and joint function as well as improve the body's ability to heal itself by optimizing nerve function. By working on your muscles and joints, Dr. Garnett can treat aches and pains and improve a broad range of other conditions through the impact on the nervous system, allowing your body to remain in a healthy equilibrium. Natural chiropractic care begins with the understanding that if you identify and treat the problem, the body will heal itself, thereby eliminating the symptom(s). Chiropractic care benefits individuals of all ages - from newborns to senior citizens. Why Get Chiropractic Care? The advantage of chiropractic care is that it provides individuals and families with a very dynamic approach to health care. Using this approach, we often find the answers to your health care that you have been searching for. Concerned about cost? We have a sliding fee, and will find a way to work with you, regardless of your ability to pay. View
